LocalFunction[name: call; isMutated: false; displayText: call] = fun call(a: R|kotlin/Int|, b: R|kotlin/String|): R|kotlin/Unit|
Local[name: x; isMutated: false; displayText: x] = lval x: R|kotlin/Int| = Int(2)
Local[name: y; isMutated: false; displayText: y] = lval y: R|kotlin/String| = String(foo)
